title: Swiss Chicken
instructions: Place ingredients in order listed in a casserole dish and bake 50 minutes at 350°.

title: Beef Stew
instructions: Mix all ingredients in large casserole dish.

title: El'S Cole Slaw
instructions: (Can use large package of shredded cole slaw, but add peppers to it.) Salt to taste.

title: Coconut Pie
instructions: Beat eggs, sugar and flour together well.
Add milk and pour over eggs, sugar and butter.
Cook at 300° for 1 hour or until brown.

title: Fried Tomatoes
instructions: Dip into beaten eggs and then into fine bread crumbs.
Fry in hot fat (half oleo and half cooking oil) until brown on both sides.
